brief_description: To evaluate the chemotactic function of peripheral blood leukocytes such as neutrophils in subjects with ADEH+, ADEH-, and NA controls.
description: To evaluate the chemotactic function of peripheral blood leukocytes such as neutrophils in subjects with ADEH+, ADEH-, and NA controls.
endpoints:
1. CD11b total- Monocytes Unstimulated
  2. CD11b activated-Monocytes Unstimulated
  3. CD11b total- Neutrophils Unstimulated
  4. CD11b activated- Neutrophils Unstimulated
  5. CD11b total-Monocytes IL-8= 1ng/mL
  6. CD11b activated-Monocytes IL-8= 1ng/mL
  7. CD11b total-Neutrophils IL-8= 1ng/mL
  8. CD11b activated-Neutrophils IL-8= 1ng/mL
  9. CD11b total-Monocytes IL-8= 10ng/mL
  10. CD11b activated-Monocytes IL-8= 10ng/mL
  11. CD11b total-Neutrophils IL-8= 10ng/mL
  12. CD11b activated-Neutrophils IL-8= 10ng/mL
  13. CD11b total-Monocytes IL-8= 100ng/mL
  14. CD11b activated-Monocytes IL-8= 100ng/mL
  15. CD11b total-Neutrophils IL-8= 100ng/mL
  16. CD11b activated-Neutrophils IL-8= 100ng/mL
  17. CD11b total-Monocytes IL-8= 1000ng/mL
  18. CD11b activated-Monocytes IL-8= 1000ng/mL
  19. CD11b total-Neutrophils IL-8= 1000ng/mL
  20. CD11b activated-Neutrophils IL-8= 1000ng/mL
  21. Total Eosinophils
  22. Total neutrophil count at baseline
  23. Total IgE
  24. IL-17A
hypothesis: ADEH+ subjects peripheral blood leukocytes (such as neutrophils) have reduced responsiveness to the potent chemoattractant, interleukin (IL)-8.
objectives: To evaluate the chemotactic function of leukocytes such as Neutrophils in subjects with ADEH+, ADEH- and NA controls.

arm.description: Atopic Dermatitis subjects with previous or current eczema herpeticum.
arm.name: AD+ EH+

arm.description: Atopic Dermatitis subjects without eczema herpeticum.
arm.name: AD+ EH-

arm.description: Nonatopic/healthy control subjects without eczema herpeticum.
arm.name: Healthy controls

program.contract_name: Atopic Dermatitis and Vaccinia Network (ADVN) Clinical Studies Consort-26629c
